recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

top sirloin 1 pound
dried thyme 1 unit
Show Ingrendients Show All Steps

Estimated Time: 78 Minutes

Recipe:

Rub the 1 pound top sirloin with dried thyme
Souvide steak at 132 degrees (Takes 60 minutes)
Pan fry steak on largest side (Takes 1 minute)
Pan fry steak on 2nd largest side (Takes 1 minute)
Pan fry steak on 3rd largest side (Takes 30 seconds)
Pan fry steak on 4th largest side (Takes 30 seconds)
Let steak sit for at least 15 min (Takes 15 minutes)
FINISHED

Get out the following ingredients:

top sirloin 1 pound
dried thyme 2 dash
Show Ingrendients Show All Steps

Estimated Time: 78 Minutes

Recipe:

Rub the 1 pound top sirloin with 2 dashs dried thyme
Souvide steak at 132 degrees (Takes 60 minutes)
Cook Grill steak in oven @ 500° (Takes 1.5 minutes)
Flip steak
Cook Grill steak in oven @ 500° (Takes 1.5 minutes)
Let steak rest (Takes 15 minutes)
FINISHED
